name: Sancho
body:
## Welcome to Sancho
Sancho is a [General Game Player](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/General_game_playing), brought to you by Steve Draper (@SteveDraper) and Andrew Rose (@arr28), the creators of Quixote and Sgian Dubh.

Sancho is open source and hosted on [GitHub](https://github.com/SteveDraper/ggp-base).
- If you want to beat us, fork the project and add your secret source!
- If you want to join us, get in touch.
- If you want to follow our progress, check out [our blog](sanchoggp.blogspot.com).

### Acknowledgements

The authors of Sancho extend their thanks to...
- Michael Genesereth for running the General Game Playing [Coursera course](https://class.coursera.org/ggp-001)
- Sam Schreiber for maintaining the [Tiltyard](http://tiltyard.ggp.org/) and providing some strong opposition 
- eJ Technologies for providing licences for their excellent [Java profiler](http://www.ej-technologies.com/products/jprofiler/overview.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
